To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 1 of a WSM program featuring recordings of speeches and performances from the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day celebration, held in Meridian, Mississippi on 1953-05-26. Program announcer is Grant Turner. Features recordings of speeches by Hank Snow, Jimmie Davis, Carrie Rodgers, and Frank Clement; and performances by Hank Snow, Jimmie Rodgers Snow, Minnie Pearl, and Carl Smith.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
